task_description: Fix CSS variable naming inconsistencies causing UI rendering issues due to mismatch between defined variables in index.css and component CSS files
user_requirements: Update all component CSS files to use the correct variable names defined in index.css

Fix all variable categories: --background-* to --color-bg-*, --text-* to --color-text-*, --border-color to --color-border-primary, --accent-color to --color-primary, --success/warning/danger-color to --color-success/warning/danger, --info-color to --color-primary
Preserve all existing styling and visual appearance
Maintain compatibility with both light and dark modes
acceptance_criteria: All CSS variables in component files match the names defined in index.css
No more undefined CSS variable warnings in browser console
UI renders correctly after rebuild with proper colors and styling
Dashboard, Calendar, and Task List components display properly
Both light and dark theme modes work correctly
edge_cases: CSS variables used in inline styles (if any)
Dynamic className assignments that might reference old variables
Hardcoded color values that bypass the variable system
constraints: Must not change color values or visual design
Must not introduce new variables or rename variables in index.css
Solution must work with existing build pipeline
No third-party CSS libraries expected to override variables
